org.neo4j.graphdb.security

Interface URLAccessRule


  • public interface URLAccessRule
    A rule to evaluate if Neo4j is permitted to reach out to the specified URL (e.g. when using LOAD CSV in Cypher).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URL validate(org.neo4j.kernel.GraphDatabaseAPI gdb, URL url)
      Validate this rule against the specified URL and configuration, and throw a URLAccessValidationError if the URL is not permitted for access.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        URL validate(org.neo4j.kernel.GraphDatabaseAPI gdb,
           URL url)
             throws org.neo4j.kernel.security.URLAccessValidationError
        Validate this rule against the specified URL and configuration, and throw a URLAccessValidationError if the URL is not permitted for access.
        Parameters:
        gdb - the current graph database
        url - the URL being validated
        Returns:
        an updated URL that should be used for accessing the resource
        Throws:
        org.neo4j.kernel.security.URLAccessValidationError - thrown if the url does not pass the validation rule
